channel.title: Need help, huge project, need only the most experienced coders
channel.description:
hey, im making a new server, it is going to be a huge project and i need alot of very experienced coders. im looking to make an almost exact replica of the real runescape, this will take alot of time and alot of hard work, but in the end the payout will be great... the things i am looking for
-are very good at coding -knows how real runescape works -knows how to work as a team
basicly that what i need, so if any1 is interested, poste here, or pm me eather way hoping to hear from some of you coding beasts out there =p

item.title: Need help, huge project, need only the most experienced coders
item.dc:creator: @Gol_Goroth Gol Goroth
item.description:
@Gol_Goroth wrote:

[quote=“Enum, post:11, topic:48361”][quote author=PEN()R link=topic=67703.msg788275#msg788275 date=1169156228]
You are a Noob, and you need good coders. I bet you don’t know what a Void is… I Hate these hopeless noobs that “PWNZ)RI)RRD OBJECT!@!@!@ OOPS SERVAOR HUGE PRBJECT”!@!# And say im tryng to make a replica of rs.

1.You would get SUED By Jagex.
2.You Would Need 20 Good Hackers
3.Hello Nice to meet you.
[/quote]

You wouldn’t need 20 good hackers? You wouldn’t get sued if you have correct protection? You lose?[/quote]

Not If i belive it was for personal use.
You would need a lot of coding ability and know who to add new images of items and players models to the cache.

Read full topic
